shortcv.p: Demitrios is currently pursuing his PhD at Athens University of Economics and Business, focusing on Social Networks Analysis, under the supervision of Professor George Giaglis. Also, co-founder at nimbata LLC (), a startup SaaS company, offering call analytics on the cloud measuring marketing ROI. He holds a BSc in Business Administration from Athens University of Economics and Business, an MSc in Information Systems from City University London and an MBA from Athens University of Economics and Business. He has worked as an IT Consultant at IBM for 5 years, involved mainly, in large scale projects in the telecommunications and energy sectors, specializing in CRM development, Business Analytics, Business Analysis and Project Management. (http://istlab.dmst.aueb.gr/wrc/, http://www.wirelessresearch.eu/)
